Interface StartContext<T>

  • Type Parameters:

    All Superinterfaces:

extends WorkContext<T>

        Start installation of a child service into registry.
        Parameters:
        valueType - the type of the service value to be added
        registry - the target service registry where new service will be installed
        name - the service name
        serviceContext - the parent service context
        Returns:
        the builder for the service
